CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Self Assessment (Employee)"), IMAGE("resource/Sales_Competency_Self_Assessment_Bar","Self Assessment",50,550), IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Draft (Manager)"), IMAGE("resource/Sales_Competency_Draft_Status","Draft",50,550), IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "In Review (Employee)"), IMAGE("resource/Sales_Competency_In_Review_Status","In Review Employee",50,550), IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Review Action Plan (Manager)"), IMAGE("resource/Sales_Competency_Review_Action_Plan_Status","Review Action Plan",50,550), IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Final Approval (Manager)"),Image( "resource/Sales_Competency_Final_Approval","Final Approval",50,550), "N/A")))))
CustomField.label: Status
